message: I'm excited to offer you this unique opportunity to acquire a high-value product. I believe it's a great fit for you, and I'm confident you'll be happy with the investment. I'm willing to start with an offer of $900000.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am looking to keep my investment within a certain budget. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $750000.

I appreciate your counteroffer, Bob. However, I'm not quite ready to meet you at $750000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I'm counteroffering at $825000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value the product will bring to your business.

I understand your position, Alice. Thank you for considering my budget constraints. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $800000, which aligns closely with my financial limits while still acknowledging the value of the product.
